definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: My head would be high as the ninth heaven.
For my head on a silver plate .
They love freedom and pledge their lives for their love.
sentences.chinese: 他们热爱自由，愿为他们的所爱抛头颅洒热血。

sentences.english: I only use one single head.
sentences.chinese: 我用一头颅兮而无万夫。

sentences.english: Under a lightless lorry, cutting his head off.
sentences.chinese: 在没打灯的卡车下，截断了头颅。

sentences.english: I liked the vibrations it sent into my skull.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢它令我头颅一块震动的感觉。

sentences.english: A saw-toothed tail and large head distinguish the reclusive Chelydra serpentine, or 'snakelike swamp thing.
sentences.chinese: 锯齿状的尾巴，巨大的头颅，是辨别鳄鱼龟的特征。

sentences.english: It is also head high uplift, and in the eyes, carefully.
sentences.chinese: 它也是头颅高高隆起，眼眶深陷，背脊缩着。

sentences.english: There are no bludgeon marks on the surviving skeletons .
sentences.chinese: 头颅上也没有棍击的痕迹。

sentences.english: Surgery has been cancelled to separate three-year-old twin girls joined at the head.
sentences.chinese: 分开两名3岁大头颅相连的孪生儿的手术被取消。

sentences.english: Radiocarbon dating showed that the head's age matched the king's date of death.
sentences.chinese: 放射性碳显示这个头颅的年龄符合国王的死期。

sentences.english: Heave his thick breath, and shake his palsied head.
sentences.chinese: 让他们摇着麻痹的头颅，喘着艰难的呼吸。

sentences.english: Blunt injury to the skull may be of varying severity.
sentences.chinese: 头颅钝器伤的严重程度不一。

sentences.english: Headless bodies are seen walking the beaches in search of their heads.
sentences.chinese: 无头的尸体行走在沙滩上寻找着自己的头颅。

sentences.english: He only felt the dull pain exploding in his skull.
sentences.chinese: 他只觉得一阵隐痛在撕裂他的头颅。

sentences.english: Can you fill his hide with harpoons or his head with fish spears?
sentences.chinese: 你岂能以长矛穿透牠的皮，以鱼叉刺透牠的头颅？

definition: variant of 榔頭|榔头[lang2 tou5]
